title: Abimelek’s Rise and Fall
summary: Judges 9 tells the story of Abimelek, Gideon’s son, who kills his brothers and makes himself king. His rule ends violently when a woman drops a millstone on his head, and he has his armor-bearer kill him to avoid shame.

faq.question: How did Abimelek become king?
faq.answer: By murdering his seventy brothers and gaining support from Shechem.

faq.question: How did Abimelek die?
faq.answer: A woman dropped a millstone on his head; then he had his servant finish him off.
